TopicTitle: how do I add pictures online? they have to have a url?

Articles.Content: yeah so I cant just upload screen caps from my computer?

Step 1: Make a screenshot or a picture on your PC

Step 2: Go to imgur

Step 3: Drag and drop your picture to the browser window

Step 4: Press Start Upload button

Step 5: Wait

Step 6: Press the button next to the "BBCode (message boards & forums)" value

Step 7: Paste the string to your post
Well, yeah, it's pretty simple. You upload screen caps from your KSP online, then link to them here :-). And most people use imgur over here. We even have built-in support for imgur albums :-).

To put in an imgur album you will want to type the following 

[imgur*]idgPj[/imgur]

Where idgPj is the unique identifier for the album (Also, you need to remove the asterisk). The above code will get you this:

Javascript is disabled. View full album
